children.name: Industrial Base
children.description: The basic industrial infrastructure that is required to become a spacefaring civilization.

children.name: Mechanized Mining
children.description: The application of mechanical engineering to mineral extraction is a fundamental requirement for any industrial society.

children.name: Offworld Construction
children.description: Construction in space presents our engineers with new design challenges that must be solved before we can build orbital stations above other worlds.

children.name: Geothermal Fracking
children.description: New fracking techniques will allow us to tap into previously unattainable pockets of geothermal resources deep beneath the planet's crust.

children.name: Powered Exoskeletons
children.description: Wearing a powered exoskeleton suit augments the user's strength and speed. The military applications are obvious, but it will also increase labor efficiency.

children.name: Zero-G Refineries
children.description: The addition of internal refineries on mining stations will substantially increase mineral production.

children.name: Assembly Patterns
children.description: Rapid iteration in construction simulations determines the optimal component assembly patterns for each building project ahead of time.
weight_modifiers:
(×1.25) One must be true
• Has Militarist Ethic
• Has Fanatic Militarist Ethic

children.name: Mineral Purification
children.description: Optimal processing of mined materials have allowed us to reach new levels of efficiency.
weight_modifiers: (×1.5) is_specialist_subject_type={TYPE=prospectorium}

children.name: Artificial Workforce
children.description: These artificial work units are perfect for menial labor tasks. They are hard-working and capable of following simple vocal instructions, but should not be expected to climb stairs.
weight_modifiers: (×0.0) Has policy Robotic Workers Outlawed

(×0.5) One must be true
• Has Spiritualist Ethic
• Has Fanatic Spiritualist Ethic

(×2.0) One must be true
• Has Materialist Ethic
• Has Fanatic Materialist Ethic
potential:
All must be false
    •   Has Gestalt Consciousness Ethic
    •   is_individual_machine=yes

children.name: Long-Range Mineral Scanners
children.description: Increased scanner range will allow us to more quickly identify mineral concentrations, and focus our mining efforts there.

children.name: Machine Template System
children.description: Standardization of assembly templates allows for improved specialization of the machine population.
potential:
One must be true
    •   Has Machine Intelligence Authority
    •   is_individual_machine=yes

children.name: Machine Template System
children.description: Rewritable assembly templates allow for the creation of bespoke robot designs.
weight_modifiers: (×0.0) Has policy Robotic Workers Outlawed
potential:
All must be false
    •   Has Gestalt Consciousness Ethic
    •   is_individual_machine=yes

children.name: Deep Core Mining
children.description: These massive drills are needed to access the rich mineral deposits that can often be found close to a planet's core.

children.name: Mineral Cutting Beams
children.description: These powerful short-range lasers can easily slice through rock, making the extraction of minerals a more efficient affair.

children.name: Weather Control Systems
children.description: The ability to alter a planet's weather patterns to suppress destructive weather phenomena will make residential buildings easier to maintain and open up new areas for habitation.

children.name: Micro-Replicators
children.description: Microscopic tools that can assist our replication units in creating the more complex circuitry needed for new drones.
potential:
One must be true
    •   Has Machine Intelligence Authority
    •   is_individual_machine=yes

children.name: Advanced Mineral Purification
children.description: Second-stage processing of pseudo-refined minerals allow for more efficient storage and transportation.
weight_modifiers: (×1.5) is_specialist_subject_type={TYPE=prospectorium}

(×0.0) All must be false
• Has Technology: Mote Stabilization
• Has Technology: Volatile Material Plants
• Has the has_market_access country flag

children.name: Integrated Cybernetics
children.description: Improving upon basic exoskeletal suits, these integrated cybernetic implants make the user more resistant to harmful environmental effects.
potential:
One must be true
    •   All must be true
	    •   Does NOT have Machine Intelligence Authority
	    •   is_individual_machine=no
    •   Has Government Civic: Driven Assimilator

children.name: Artificial Specialists
children.description: Upgraded artificial units have an expanded movement range equal to that of most organics. Their neural processors have also been greatly improved.
weight_modifiers: (×0.0) Has policy Robotic Workers Outlawed

(×0.5) One must be true
• Has Spiritualist Ethic
• Has Fanatic Spiritualist Ethic

(×2.0) One must be true

• Has Fanatic Materialist Ethic
(×2.0) Has Origin Mechanist

    •   is_individual_machine=yes

children.name: Autonomous Mining Drones
children.description: Fleets of autonomous drones equipped with mining beams are deployed to quickly and efficiently gather nearby minerals.

children.name: Cross-Model Standardization
children.description: Improved production practices allow for greater alterations to robots without compromising core functionality.
weight_modifiers: (×0.0) Has policy Robotic Workers Outlawed
(×2.0) Has Origin Mechanist
potential:
All must be false
    •   Has Gestalt Consciousness Ethic
    •   is_individual_machine=yes

children.name: Anti-Gravity Engineering
children.description: With directional gravity technology, buildings on the surface of planets can reach higher than ever before without risking structural collapse. The sky is the limit!
weight_modifiers: (×0.0) Has Government Civic: Agrarian Idyll

children.name: Mineral Isolation
children.description: Advanced spectrometry combines with fracking techniques and chemical flushing to rapidly exploit shallow and mid-depth deposits.

children.name: Binary Motivators
children.description: These advanced motivators are both smaller and lighter than previous versions, allowing robotic units to allocate additional space for subsystems.
potential:
One must be true
    •   Has Machine Intelligence Authority
    •   is_individual_machine=yes

children.name: Nanite Mineral Probes
children.description: These special probes are equipped with swarms of nanites that identify previously unknown mineral concentrations and mark them for later extraction.

children.name: Construction Templates
children.description: Standardized pre-fab templates massively reduce on-site facility construction times.
weight_modifiers:
(×0.5) All must be false
• has_trait_in_council={TRAIT=leader_trait_expertise_industry}
• has_trait_in_council={TRAIT=leader_trait_curator}

(×1.25) One must be true
• Has Militarist Ethic
• Has Fanatic Militarist Ethic

children.description: Modelled on organic DNA, these microscopic machine intellects are capable of autonomously assembling most components needed for new drones.

children.name: Identity Fusion
children.description: Merging the identities and memories of two or more Synthetics into a mechanical body will create new, somewhat unique individuals.
potential: has_machine_age_dlc=yes
Has the advanced_identity_creation country flag

children.name: Identity Initialization
children.description: We will be able to initialize an identity kernel and provide it with a virtual childhood. While expensive, we can simulate the optimal experiences to generate productive personalities.
potential: has_machine_age_dlc=yes
Has the advanced_identity_creation country flag

children.name: Artificial Personality Matrix
children.description: Equipped with a personality, synthetics will finally be able to interact socially on equal terms with the rest of our citizens. Some units may even assume leadership roles.
weight_modifiers: (×0.0) Has policy Robotic Workers Outlawed
(×0.0) Has policy AI Outlawed
(×0.33) Is Necrophage

All must be false
    •   Has Gestalt Consciousness Ethic
    •   is_individual_machine=yes

children.name: Hyper-Forge
children.description: This forge's production speed is limited only by the quantity of resources loaded into it.
weight_modifiers: (×0.0) NOT has_crisis_level=crisis_cosmogenesis_level_5
(×1.5) Has Technological Ascendancy Ascension Perk

(×2.0) Any Owned Planet
• Is Synaptic Lathe
• num_pops>50

children.name: Auto-Forge
children.description: The expansive nano-replicator bays in this forge transform raw materials into advanced alloys with marvelous efficiency.

children.name: Extraction Patterns
children.description: Changes in how mineral deposits are evaluated relative to each other lead to more efficient boring patterns.

children.name: Robot Manufacturing Nexus
children.description: An avant-garde assembly complex manned by expert Roboticists, this facility transcends conventional bounds, meticulously realizing the forefront of robotic innovation.
weight_modifiers: (×0.0) NOT has_crisis_level=crisis_cosmogenesis_level_4
(×0.0) Has Hive Mind Authority
(×1.5) Has Technological Ascendancy Ascension Perk

(×2.0) Any Owned Planet
• Is Synaptic Lathe
• num_pops>50

children.name: Robot Quantum Production Hub
children.description: A marvel in engineering, this facility's quantic assembly line uses entanglement converters to craft machine parts down to the most minute detail. Not a single atom is misplaced.

children.name: Affluence Center
children.description: This center effortlessly materializes the most outlandish desires at a moment's notice.

children.name: Affluence Emporium
children.description: This center anticipates and fulfills material desires using an advanced procurement algorithm, delivering satisfaction before the populace realizes their wants.
weight_modifiers: (×0.0) NOT has_crisis_level=crisis_cosmogenesis_level_5
(×1.5) Has Technological Ascendancy Ascension Perk

(×2.0) Any Owned Planet
• Is Synaptic Lathe
• num_pops>50

children.name: Assembly Algorithms
children.description: The application of game and puzzle theory has the potential to greatly optimize modular assembly and construction.

children.name: Nanocomposite Materials
children.description: Reinforced nanocomposite hull plating can provide an extra layer of protection that could be the difference between life and death in a combat situation.

children.name: Ceramo-Metal Materials
children.description: A combination of different metals and ceramics that result in a strong armor without sacrificing flexibility.
weight_modifiers: (×1.5) is_specialist_subject_type={TYPE=bulwark}

children.name: Nano-Circuit Assembly
children.description: With pre-programmed nano-circuits, many consumer products can be rapidly assembled in fabricators.
weight_modifiers:
(×0.0) All must be false
• Has Technology: Rare Crystal Mining
• Has Technology: Rare Crystal Manufacturing
• Has the has_market_access country flag
(×1.5) is_specialist_subject_type={TYPE=prospectorium}
potential: Use consumer goods

children.name: Holographic Casts
children.description: Solid holographic casts can alter their shapes at a moment's notice, speeding up alloy production.
weight_modifiers:
(×0.0) All must be false
• Has Technology: Mote Stabilization
• Has Technology: Volatile Material Plants
• Has the has_market_access country flag
(×1.5) is_specialist_subject_type={TYPE=prospectorium}

children.name: Betharian Refining
children.description: The Betharian minerals appear to have originated from singular source, but were scattered across the galaxy millennia ago. The minerals are most often encountered as pebble-sized clusters, and are highly flammable.
weight_modifiers: (×1.0)

(×0.0) No Owned Planet
• Has deposit Betharian Fields

children.name: Ceramo-Metal Alloys
children.description: The widespread use of advanced ceramics in industry can improve metallurgical yields.

children.name: Exotic Gas Extraction
children.description: Pockets of Exotic Gas are rare and often inaccessible by conventional means. Such deposits can only be reached by using special extractor technology.

children.description: Plasteel is an elastic material that combines many of the qualities of plastics and metal. It is relatively cheap to produce and can be used to augment ship armor.
weight_modifiers: (×1.5) is_specialist_subject_type={TYPE=bulwark}

children.name: Armor Hardening
children.description: ARMOR_HARDENER_1_DESC

children.name: Replicator Kiosks
children.description: These kiosks can replicate any pre-approved object if its pattern has been stored within their memory banks.
weight_modifiers: (×1.5) is_specialist_subject_type={TYPE=prospectorium}
potential: Use consumer goods

children.name: Nano-Separators
children.description: Nano-separators are a revolutionary new step in the creation of alloys, simplifying the casting process while improving overall production quality.
weight_modifiers: (×1.5) is_specialist_subject_type={TYPE=prospectorium}

children.name: Durasteel Materials
children.description: This strong yet flexible material is capable of withstanding severe punishment. It serves well as ship armor.
weight_modifiers: (×1.5) is_specialist_subject_type={TYPE=bulwark}

children.name: Durasteel-Laced Alloys
children.description: By replacing antiquated ceramo-metal equipment with cutting edge technology, we can run our forges hotter and longer, increasing production.

children.name: Neutronium Materials
children.description: This incredibly dense and strong material can resist firepower that would turn armor made of any other alloys into slag.
weight_modifiers: (×1.5) is_specialist_subject_type={TYPE=bulwark}

children.name: Living Metal
children.description: Mining and processing the rare living metals is exceedingly difficult, but successful application of the mutable alloys yields incomparable advantages.
weight_modifiers:
(×0.0) No Planet within borders
• Has deposit Living Metal discovered\n

children.name: Adaptive Armor Hardening
children.description: ARMOR_HARDENER_2_DESC

children.name: Matter Compression
children.description: Compressing suitable materials into ultra-dense forms is a cheap and efficient way to improve their ability to absorb weapons-grade impacts.

children.name: Quantum Drilling Hub
children.description: This mining hub can extract minerals anywhere down to the planet's outer core using quantum tunneling technology to bore through solid or liquid materials without physical contact.

children.name: Quantum Drilling Plant
children.description: This mining plant can find minerals anywhere in this planet's mantle using quantum tunneling technology to bore through solid materials without physical contact.
weight_modifiers: (×0.0) NOT has_crisis_level=crisis_cosmogenesis_level_2
(×1.5) Has Technological Ascendancy Ascension Perk

(×2.0) Any Owned Planet
• Is Synaptic Lathe
• num_pops>50

children.name: Dimensional Fabricator
children.description: This advanced fabricator seamlessly tunnels into the fabric of dimensional space, extracting valuable resources.

children.name: Dimensional Replicator
children.description: This fabricator's technology achieves flawless conversion from energy to matter.
weight_modifiers: (×0.0) NOT has_crisis_level=crisis_cosmogenesis_level_4
(×1.5) Has Technological Ascendancy Ascension Perk

(×2.0) Any Owned Planet

children.name: Flak Battery
children.description: Gun batteries that fire shrapnel rounds at close range. They are particularly lethal to enemy strike craft, but can also defend against missiles.

children.name: Chemical Thrusters
children.description: Simple yet moderately effective chemical thrusters that rely on combustible propellant to function.

children.name: Nuclear Missiles
children.description: Space-to-space missiles equipped with high-yield nuclear warheads. Although based on old pre-space technology, these crude fire-and-forget weapons can be surprisingly effective at range.

children.name: Mass Drivers
children.description: These electromagnetic projectile launchers use magnets to accelerate armor-piercing rounds towards targets at high speeds.

children.name: Afterburners
children.description: These powerful thrusters provide additional combat speed but consume a great deal of power.
weight_modifiers: (×2.0) Has Technology: Ion Thrusters
(×2.0) Has Technology: Plasma Thrusters

children.name: Fusion Missiles
children.description: These updated space-to-space missiles have more powerful fusion warheads and improved flight performance.
weight_modifiers: (×1.25) Has Militarist Ethic
(×1.5) Has Fanatic Militarist Ethic

children.name: Space Torpedoes
children.description: These torpedoes are essentially very large, slow-moving missiles. They are equipped with more powerful warheads and shield modulators that let them slip unmolested through energy screens.
weight_modifiers: (×1.25) Has Militarist Ethic
(×1.5) Has Fanatic Militarist Ethic

children.name: Coilguns
children.description: Coilguns are more powerful versions of the early mass drivers, using electromagnetic coils to rapidly accelerate projectiles towards targets.
weight_modifiers: (×1.25) Has Militarist Ethic
(×1.5) Has Fanatic Militarist Ethic

children.name: Ion Thrusters
children.description: These electric thrusters use beams of ions to generate thrust without the need for propellant.
weight_modifiers: (×2.0) Has Technology: Destroyers

children.name: Antimatter Missiles
children.description: Advanced missiles equipped with very powerful antimatter warheads. A new and improved guidance system gives them a better chance of finding their targets.
weight_modifiers: (×1.25) Has Militarist Ethic
(×1.5) Has Fanatic Militarist Ethic

children.name: Railguns
children.description: The latest in electromagnetic accelerators, railguns use twin parallel rails to fire projectiles at incredible speeds.
weight_modifiers: (×1.25) Has Militarist Ethic
(×1.5) Has Fanatic Militarist Ethic

children.name: Autocannons
children.description: Large-caliber ballistic weapons that fire cased explosive shells. The main advantage of these cannons is their high rate of fire.
weight_modifiers: (×1.25) Has Militarist Ethic
(×1.5) Has Fanatic Militarist Ethic
(×0.5) Does NOT have Technology: Mass Drivers

children.name: Swarmer Missiles
children.description: These smaller missiles are launched in volleys and have been specifically designed to overwhelm enemy point-defense systems.
weight_modifiers: (×1.25) Has Militarist Ethic
(×1.5) Has Fanatic Militarist Ethic

children.name: Flak Cannons
children.description: Upgraded flak batteries with new, more powerful shrapnel rounds.
weight_modifiers: (×1.25) Has Militarist Ethic
(×1.5) Has Fanatic Militarist Ethic

children.name: Ripper Cannons
children.description: These upgraded rotary autocannons feature improved tracking and fire control systems. This allows them to maintain an even higher rate of fire.
weight_modifiers: (×1.25) Has Militarist Ethic
(×1.5) Has Fanatic Militarist Ethic

children.name: Plasma Thrusters
children.description: An advanced form of electric propulsion, plasma thrusters afford ships greater sublight speeds and maneuverability.
weight_modifiers: (×2.0) Has Technology: Cruisers

children.name: Quantum Missiles
children.description: The latest version of space-to-space missile, this upgraded variant has an immensely powerful warhead that draws its energy from a zero point vacuum.
weight_modifiers: (×1.25) Has Militarist Ethic
(×1.5) Has Fanatic Militarist Ethic

children.name: Advanced Railguns
children.description: A new version of the venerable railgun, with sturdier rails and an enhanced power supply. These weapons are even more powerful and accurate than their predecessors.
weight_modifiers: (×1.25) Has Militarist Ethic
(×1.5) Has Fanatic Militarist Ethic

children.name: Advanced Afterburners
children.description: This improved version of the standard afterburners provide an even greater boost to a ship's combat speed.

children.name: Armored Torpedoes
children.description: Upgraded space torpedoes encased in armor, to better withstand enemy point-defense fire. The armor fragments into shards that cause additional damage when the torpedo detonates.
weight_modifiers: (×1.25) Has Militarist Ethic
(×1.5) Has Fanatic Militarist Ethic

children.name: Kinetic Battery
children.description: Very long-range artillery capable of hurling powerful rounds over extreme distances with a large degree of accuracy.
weight_modifiers: (×1.25) Has Militarist Ethic
(×1.5) Has Fanatic Militarist Ethic

children.name: Flak Artillery
children.description: Predictive tracking algorithms and even more powerful rounds make these batteries incredibly lethal to enemy strike craft.
weight_modifiers: (×1.25) Has Militarist Ethic
(×1.5) Has Fanatic Militarist Ethic

children.name: Stormfire Cannons
children.description: Advanced rotary autocannons capable of spewing a cloud of high-explosive shells at a target.
weight_modifiers: (×1.25) Has Militarist Ethic
(×1.5) Has Fanatic Militarist Ethic

children.name: Impulse Thrusters
children.description: These highly advanced fusion-powered thrusters provide ships with unmatched maneuverability and speed under sublight conditions.
weight_modifiers: (×2.0) Has Technology: Battleships

children.name: Gauss Cannons
children.description: This updated version of the old coilgun design is even more destructive than the latest railgun designs. It is capable of launching projectiles with incredible accuracy and speed.
weight_modifiers: (×1.25) Has Militarist Ethic
(×1.5) Has Fanatic Militarist Ethic

children.name: Kinetic Artillery
children.description: An even more powerful long-range, ship-based artillery cannon, equipped with a new barrel and an upgraded fire control computer.
weight_modifiers: (×1.25) Has Militarist Ethic
(×1.5) Has Fanatic Militarist Ethic

children.name: Mega Cannon
children.description: An enormous mass accelerator cannon that can only be placed in a spinal mount and fires monstrously powerful rounds over vast distances.
weight_modifiers: (×1.25) Has Militarist Ethic
(×1.5) Has Fanatic Militarist Ethic

children.name: Marauder Missiles
children.description: These highly advanced missiles are equipped with limited onboard AI pilots that substantially improve their performance and ability to track targets.
weight_modifiers: (×1.25) Has Militarist Ethic
(×1.5) Has Fanatic Militarist Ethic

children.name: Devastator Torpedoes
children.description: Advanced torpedoes with very powerful warheads. They have a sleeker design, faster engines and upgraded shield modulators for slipping through energy screens.
weight_modifiers: (×1.25) Has Militarist Ethic
(×1.5) Has Fanatic Militarist Ethic

children.name: Whirlwind Missiles
children.description: New miniaturization techniques will allow us to equip swarmer missiles with more powerful warheads and improved flight performance.
weight_modifiers: (×1.25) Has Militarist Ethic
(×1.5) Has Fanatic Militarist Ethic

children.name: Giga Cannon
children.description: An even more powerful mass accelerator cannon that can rip through even the toughest shields.
weight_modifiers: (×1.25) Has Militarist Ethic
(×1.5) Has Fanatic Militarist Ethic

children.name: High-Density Munitions
children.description: Ultra-dense slugs can punch through even the strongest of projected shields.

children.name: Loader Efficiency
children.description: Minor technical advances combine with improved shipboard routines for handling munitions to provide a noticeable boost in fire rate.

children.name: Thermodynamic Yield Control
children.description: With the chemical reaction tightly controlled by missile-board microprocessors, warhead detonations can be tuned for maximum effect for local conditions at the time of impact.

children.name: Dark Matter Propulsion
children.description: SHIP_THRUSTER_5_DESC
weight_modifiers:
(×0.0) All must be false
• Is of country type: COUNTRY_FALLEN_EMPIRE
• Is of country type: COUNTRY_AWAKENED_FALLEN_EMPIRE

children.name: Miniaturized Pre-Igniters
children.description: Advances in miniaturization allow for more rapid loading and discharging of rocket-propelled payloads.

children.name: Space Exploration
children.description: The realization of faster-than-light travel is a new dawn for space exploration. Manned missions to other star systems are now not only possible, but necessary.

children.name: Orbital Energy Conversion
children.description: Advances in solar panel technology could offset the operating costs of our starbases. The panels would require an entire starbase module to generate enough energy, however.
potential: Has Gestalt Consciousness Ethic

children.name: Starport
children.description: The earliest starbases were little more than makeshift outposts. Permanent starports will enable us to maintain a firmer grip on star systems.

children.name: Starbase Construction
children.description: A centralized space installation built in close orbit around the system primary is necessary to make full use of the resources in a star system.

children.name: Deep Space Defenses
children.description: This will enable the construction of defensive deep space platforms to protect our Starbases.

children.name: Corvettes
children.description: The FTL breakthrough allowed early attempts to adapt traditional surface-to-space shuttle frames to military applications to finally create relatively small, fast, and maneuverable vessels with limited firepower.

children.name: Interplanetary Expeditionary Forces
children.description: The invasion of another world is a staggering enterprise. There are immense logistical challenges that must be overcome before we can muster our first interplanetary armies.

children.name: Standardized Corvette Patterns
children.description: Establishing new standards for the modeling and construction of corvettes greatly improves the efficiency of the production pipeline.

children.name: Improved Corvette Hulls
children.description: Advances in building techniques will allow for the construction of sturdier and more durable corvettes.

children.name: Carrier Operations
children.description: These manned strike craft are launched from a mothership and rely on their speed and small size to survive long enough to punch through enemy defenses.

children.name: L-Gate Insight
children.description: Intensive study within the fields of nanomachinery and subspace phenomena will eventually yield a new §YL-Gate Insight§! into the Disabled L-Gate mystery.
potential: Has the encountered_first_lgate country flag
Does NOT have the completed_lcluster_chain country flag
Does NOT have the l_cluster_opened global flag

children.description: While larger than Corvettes, Destroyer hull configurations still make for comparatively nimble gunboats.
